src:
De liberalkonservativa
Anders Borg och Carl Bildt satt bredvid varandra på riksdagens läktare när statsminister Fredrik Reinfeldt läste upp regeringsförklaringen den 6 oktober 2006. Alliansen hade vunnit valet och de skulle utnämnas till finans- respektive utrikesminister.
03 Nov 2019, 15:30 by PM Nilsson

text:
The Liberal Conservatives
Anders Borg and Carl Bildt sat next to each other at Parliament's stands when Prime Minister Fredrik Reinfeldt read the Government Declaration on October 6, 2006. The alliance had won the election and they were to be appointed Finance and Foreign Ministers respectively.
03 Nov 2019, 15:30 by PM Nilsson
